divs: Sighting DetailsI was fishing from the 7 miles bridge facing west. the night was rainy and windy, all other fishermen left because of the weather except my buddy and a chinese couple on their honeymoon from new york. at 11.20pm I quit fishing because there was nothing biting and turn around facing the highway and then there it was, My buddy told me to turn around and watch. it was an orange plate, stood there for exactly three minutes and then it flew south and stopped again and there is where I starte getting nervous. the chinese couple left right away and the ufo then started dropping what appeared to me attime to be rectangular plates that went right into de sea crisscrossing each one maybe it was about a mile from where we were it was what appeared to me. two days later a radio commentator here in miami, announced that the cubanair force was in pursuit of two ufos around havana for several hours the same night I am talking about . my buddy never went fishing to that area. yours very truly placido bouza
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Marathon
There were no other sightings in Marathon on or around November 30th 1998
